entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Snow level rising to 1500 metres in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending after midnight then clearing. Flurries near midnight. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
